name: Unity Documentation Night Mode
description:
Learn the Unity engine without going blind. This is basically a full conversion of what the documentation site would look like if it had a night mode.

Based on SmorcIRL's style
additional_info:
If there are any issues then just let me know with a link to the page with errors and what the issue is.

3/14/2020 Update: 

* Added an option to choose between either the gray or white search bar.

* Slightly decreased body font brightness.

* Slightly decreased the brightness of the the top right "unity3d.com" background.

* Changed the font color of the home page for the user manual documentation page.

style_setting_options.label: Gray Search Bar
White Search Bar
